adobe acrobat:
Clicking on the text means select the text. To select the entire sentence, use click operation three times. For example, click(x,y)
click(x,y)
click(x,y)

When use drag operation, please use moveTo({start_x}, {start_y})
mouseDown()
moveTo({end_x}, {end_y}, duration={duration})
mouseUp()
When delete option is not shown in the GUI, please press 'delete' button in the keyboard.
